description.zh-cn: 中国女子网球运动员，于2021年11月在微博发文指控前中共中央政治局常委张高丽对其性侵。
description.en: Chinese female tennis player who, in November 2021, accused former Politburo Standing Committee member Zhang Gaoli of sexual assault on Weibo.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理。被彭帅指控性侵。
description.en: A former major leader of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council. Accused of sexual assault by Peng Shuai.

nodes.id: 彭帅指控张高丽性侵事件

zh-cn: 彭帅指控张高丽性侵事件

description.zh-cn: 指中国网球运动员彭帅于2021年11月2日在社交媒体上发文，指控中共中央政治局前常委、国务院前副总理张高丽对其进行性侵犯，并发展出不伦关系，引发国际社会广泛关注的事件。
description.en: Refers to the incident where Chinese tennis player Peng Shuai posted on social media on November 2, 2021, accusing former Politburo Standing Committee member and Vice Premier Zhang Gaoli of sexual assault and of developing an extramarital affair, which attracted widespread international attention.

description.zh-cn: 张高丽的妻子，被彭帅指控知晓并纵容张高丽的行为，并对彭帅进行言语侮辱。
description.en: Wife of Zhang Gaoli, accused by Peng Shuai of being aware of and condoning Zhang's actions, and of verbally insulting Peng Shuai.

zh-cn: 世界女子职业网球协会

description.zh-cn: 世界女子职业网球的管理组织。在此事件中，该组织公开声援彭帅，并暂停了在中国的赛事。
description.en: The governing body of women's professional tennis. In this incident, the organization publicly supported Peng Shuai and suspended its tournaments in China.

description.zh-cn: 国际女子网球协会（WTA）主席，代表WTA就彭帅事件多次发表声明，表达关切并要求调查。
description.en: Chairman of the Women's Tennis Association (WTA), who issued multiple statements on behalf of the WTA regarding the Peng Shuai incident, expressing concern and demanding an investigation.

description.zh-cn: 在此事件中，中国政府被指对相关信息进行严格审查，并通过官方媒体发布彭帅安好的信息，其外交部则称事件不应被政治化。
description.en: In this incident, the Chinese government was accused of strictly censoring related information and releasing information through state media suggesting Peng Shuai was safe, while its Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated the incident should not be politicized.

description.zh-cn: 该组织在此事件中与彭帅进行视频通话，并称其安全无虞，但其做法被外界批评为帮助中国政府掩盖真相。
description.en: In this incident, the organization held video calls with Peng Shuai and claimed she was safe, but its actions were criticized by outsiders for helping the Chinese government cover up the truth.

description.zh-cn: 国际奥林匹克委员会主席，曾与彭帅进行视频通话及会面。
description.en: President of the International Olympic Committee, who had video calls and a meeting with Peng Shuai.

description.zh-cn: 中国社交媒体平台，彭帅最初在此发布指控，但帖子很快被删除，其账号也被禁言。
description.en: A Chinese social media platform where Peng Shuai initially posted her allegations, but the post was quickly deleted and her account was silenced.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。张高丽曾是其成员。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Chinese Communist Party. Zhang Gaoli was a former member.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的中央人民政府。张高丽曾任副总理。
description.en: The central government of the People's Republic of China. Zhang Gaoli served as its Vice Premier.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责外交事务的部门，其发言人多次回应彭帅事件，称其“并非外交问题”并反对“恶意炒作”。
description.en: The department responsible for foreign affairs in the People's Republic of China. Its spokesperson responded to the Peng Shuai incident multiple times, stating it was 'not a diplomatic issue' and opposing 'malicious hype'.

description.zh-cn: 在彭帅披露事件并失踪后，国际社会在网络上发起的寻找彭帅并关注其人身安全的运动。
description.en: After Peng Shuai disclosed the incident and disappeared, the international community launched an online movement to find her and raise concerns about her personal safety.

description.zh-cn: 联合国人权事务高级专员办事处就彭帅事件发声，呼吁中国进行全面透明的调查。
description.en: The Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights of the United Nations spoke out on the Peng Shuai incident, calling for a full and transparent investigation by China.

description.zh-cn: 美国政府对此事件表示关切，并呼吁中国提供可核实的证据证明彭帅的安全。
description.en: The United States government expressed concern over the incident and called on China to provide verifiable evidence of Peng Shuai's safety.

description.zh-cn: 法国外交部长就彭帅事件警告中国，若不让彭帅发声将采取外交行动。
description.en: The French Foreign Minister warned China regarding the Peng Shuai incident, stating that diplomatic action would be taken if she was not allowed to speak.

description.zh-cn: 欧盟要求中国政府提供可核实的证据，证明彭帅的安全、健康和下落。
description.en: The European Union demanded verifiable proof from the Chinese government regarding Peng Shuai's safety, well-being, and whereabouts.

description.zh-cn: 彭帅于2021年11月2日在微博发文，指控张高丽利用权势强迫其发生性关系并对其始乱终弃。
description.en: On November 2, 2021, Peng Shuai posted on Weibo, accusing Zhang Gaoli of using his power to force her into a sexual relationship and then abandoning her.

description.zh-cn: 康洁是张高丽的妻子。
description.en: Kang Jie is Zhang Gaoli's wife.

description.zh-cn: 彭帅指控康洁在其背后多次进行言语侮辱。
description.en: Peng Shuai accused Kang Jie of verbally insulting her multiple times behind her back.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 张高丽是中国共产党第十八届中央政治局常委。
description.en: Zhang Gaoli was a member of the 18th Politburo Standing Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 在彭帅发布指控文章约二十分钟后，新浪微博官方删除了该文章，并禁言了其账号。
description.en: About twenty minutes after Peng Shuai published her accusation post, Sina Weibo officially deleted the post and silenced her account.

relationships.target: 彭帅指控张高丽性侵事件

description.zh-cn: 中国政府对此事件进行了严格的网络审查，屏蔽了相关关键词。
description.en: The Chinese government imposed strict internet censorship on this incident, blocking related keywords.

description.zh-cn: WTA主席西蒙发表声明，表示对事件深感担忧，并要求进行全面、公平、透明的调查。
description.en: WTA Chairman Steve Simon issued a statement expressing deep concern about the incident and demanding a full, fair, and transparent investigation.

description.zh-cn: 因担忧彭帅的安全，WTA宣布立即暂停所有在中国（包括香港）的WTA巡回赛赛事。
description.en: Due to concerns for Peng Shuai's safety, the WTA announced the immediate suspension of all WTA tournaments in China, including Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 在彭帅音信全无后，国际球坛与民众在网络上发起此运动，以关注其下落和安全。
description.en: After Peng Shuai's whereabouts became unknown, the international tennis community and the public launched this online movement to raise concern for her location and safety.

description.zh-cn: 与彭帅进行了数次视讯通话，并于2022年2月5日在北京会面。
description.en: Had several video calls with Peng Shuai and met with her in Beijing on February 5, 2022.

relationships.target: 彭帅指控张高丽性侵事件

description.zh-cn: 国际奥委会安排与彭帅进行视讯通话，并对外宣称其安全，此举被批评为“静默外交”，并被指责帮助中国政府淡化事件的严重性。
description.en: The IOC arranged video calls with Peng Shuai and publicly stated she was safe, an act criticized as 'quiet diplomacy' and accused of helping the Chinese government downplay the seriousness of the incident.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部
relationships.target: 彭帅指控张高丽性侵事件

description.zh-cn: 外交部发言人多次在记者会上表示对此事“不了解”，称其“并非外交问题”，并希望“某些人停止恶意炒作”。相关问答均未被收录至官网新闻稿。
description.en: Ministry spokespersons repeatedly stated at press conferences that they had 'no knowledge' of the matter, calling it 'not a diplomatic issue' and hoping 'some people would stop the malicious hype.' The related Q&As were not included in the official transcripts on the ministry's website.

description.zh-cn: 联合国人权事务高级专员办事处呼吁中国对彭帅的指控进行全面和透明的调查。
description.en: The UN Office of the High Commissioner for Human Rights called on China to conduct a full and transparent investigation into Peng Shuai's allegations.

description.zh-cn: 美国白宫呼吁中国当局提供独立的、可核实的证据，证明彭帅的下落和她的安全。
description.en: The US White House called on Chinese authorities to provide independent, verifiable proof of Peng Shuai's whereabouts and her safety.
